title: President & SLPP MPs to meet on fuel crisis
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A discussion between President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and the ruling party’s Parliamentary group is due to be held tomorrow (20).
The relevant meeting will be held at the Presidential Secretariat in Fort tomorrow at 5 PM, following the Cabinet meeting.
The current fuel crisis, and the solutions for the crisis will be discussed at the meeting, in addition to the upcoming Parliamentary week.
